p: To overcome these issues, several improvements have been suggested. An ulterior simplification of the notification sheet could accelerate the process of notification and reduce the number of incomplete reports. Frequent suggestions concerned the creation of technical tools to facilitate the notification process, such as a mobile application, or the integration of the SINAN with the digital records of healthcare units and with the database of public laboratories. To prevent the overload of laboratories, the implementation of the guidelines for the epidemic and non-epidemic period was suggested.
